definitions.definition: To overcome or lose a state of intoxication .
examples: It took him hours to sober up .

definitions.definition: To moderate one's feelings; to accept a disappointing reality after losing one's ability to believe in a fantastic goal.
examples: Losing his job was a sobering experience.

main_definition: ( often with up ) To make or become sober.
secondary_definitions: ( often with up ) To overcome or lose a state of intoxication .
To moderate one's feelings; to accept a disappointing reality after losing one's ability to believe in a fantastic goal.
